name: Pepper (Bell) - Healthy
description: Represents a healthy, disease-free bell pepper leaf. This is the ideal state of the plant, indicating it has adequate nutrients, water, and sunlight, and is free from pathogens and pests.
symptoms: Leaves are uniformly green (ranging from bright to deep green depending on age and variety), firm, and turgid. The leaf surface is smooth and may have a slight natural gloss. Veins are clear with no discoloration.
causes: This is a healthy state, not a disease. It is 'caused' by providing optimal growing conditions.

favorable_conditions.environment: N/A. This section is replaced by 'Key Requirements for Health'.

prevention: N/A. This section is replaced by 'Best Practices for Maintenance'.

chemical_control: N/A. The 'solution' is to maintain the best practices to keep the plant in this healthy state.

dataset_metadata.intended_use: Machine learning training, research, and educational purpose
